name: KZ: A Holocaust Tale DEMO
description:
Content Warning:

KZ: A Holocaust Tale explores and depicts themes of violence, execution, genocide, trauma, infant mortality, torture and suicide.

Viewer discretion is advised.

Hello
I am C. Kitsune, writer, programmer and artist for KZ: A Holocaust Tale. Feel free to try out the game versions i will be uploading (Current Version: 0.2 / as of 03/30/2020) in the links provided above. I hope you enjoy what i'm working in, and if possible, support me. That would mean a lot to me!

KZ: A Holocaust Tale will be a nonlinear visual novel involving points of view of different characters living the Holocaust. One Concentration Camp Commandant and one Jewish Victim, both individuals that can have their paths met in the midway of the dark time, which can result in a deadly encounter. The Jewish Victim deals with his own tragedies and dramas, as he interacts with the world around him, while the Commandant deals with his work and ambitions.

I Intend to update the game about once a month. Every update will include more story (i'm creating the story first to after add detailed/final artwork in the development of the game). KZ: A Holocaust Tale will feature choices that greatly affect the growth of the story as well as your relationships with other characters.

The complete Game is going to be finished in 2020, and it's going to feature two entire years of game (the time in the game is going from 1939 to January 1942), and the Ghetto times (specifically, the Litzmannstadt Ghetto), before the construction of Concentration Camps like Auschwitz, for example.

If you wish to contact me, you can email me at professionaljohann.p@gmail.com

Either way, repeating what i have said before, i hope you enjoy what i have to offer!
